Rebecca Chikodiri

Portfolio

About

Experienced WordPress Developer with over 3 years of experience creating and maintaining complex WordPress sites. Skilled in Translating UI/UX design wireframes to web pages, implementation of WordPress themes and plugins, as well as optimizing site performance and security. Committed to staying up-to-date with the latest WordPress developments and continuously improving technical skills.

Also a young web developer, I have a passion for coding and a strong desire to learn new technologies. I am currently learning React, Angular and Next.js to expand my skill set.

Around the Web

About Rebecca

Rebecca is a web developer based in Abuja. She is goal oriented and dedicated to her work. Rebecca .

Copyright © Your Website 2023

GetMida

Solely worked on the website (except the web app) — GetMida

Built the following pages:
landing page(Home), MidaCollect, Recovery, Debt Buying, MidaOmni, MidaX, About, Careers, and Contact.

Tech stack: JavaScript, HTML, CSS.

Zendwallet

Solely worked on the FAQ, Blog, and Career sections of the Zendwallet website, which is built with WordPress. Other sections were developed in Next.js, where I contributed as a junior React developer. all pages worked on the next js are for programmatic seo

Built or contributed to the following pages and features:

  • Converter: USD → ZAR, BTC → USDT, USDC → USDT, SOL → USDT, ETH → USDT, Tron Wallet, etc.
  • Products: Deposit BTC ,Swap BTC, Withdraw BTC, Deposit USDT, Swap USDT, Withdraw USDT, Deposit ETH, Swap ETH, Withdraw ETH, Deposit USDC, Swap USDC, Withdraw USDC, Deposit BNB, Swap BNB, Withdraw BNB
  • Converter: Crypto → Naira, Cedis, Central African CFA, South African Rand, Ugandan Shilling, Tanzanian Shilling, and Kenyan Shilling.
  • Use Cases: Use Cases, Import/Export, Financial Services.

Tech stack: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, WordPress, Next.js, React.

Renmoney Microfinance Bank

The Renmoney website is built with WordPress using page builder (Elementor), while the web app is built with Angular. The website supports secure form submissions, is optimized for speed, and protected against attacks. Renmoney

Tech stack: JavaScript, HTML, SASS, WordPress, Angular.

EnjoyBreeze

EnjoyBreeze is a website built with WordPress using the Elementor page builder. It is owned by SeamlessHR. The website supports secure form submissions, is optimized for speed, and protected against attacks.

EnjoyBreeze

Tech stack: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, WordPress.

Shopstation

ShopStation is a WooCommerce website that sells beauty products. I did not develop the website, but I maintained it for a period of five months. My responsibilities included monthly maintenance, updating all plugins, and resolving payment gateway issues using PHP. Visit ShopStation

Qefas

Qefas is an educational website built with WordPress, using LearnDash and BuddyBoss for the learning and community features, and Elementor as the page builder. I am still actively working on adding new features and improvements. Visit Qefas
